title: Opinion: New York Giants team doctor: Clinics offering ‘miracle injections,’ ‘next generation cell therapies’ are selling false hope
description: “As head team physician for the New York Giants, I routinely have athletes asking about supposed ‘breakthrough’ stem cell treatments,” writes Scott Rodeo.
content: “As head team physician for the New York Giants, I routinely have athletes asking about supposed ‘breakthrough’ stem cell treatments,” writes Scott Rodeo.
